findings.LIVER: The liver is diffusely echogenic. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites.
findings.BILE DUCTS: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 7 mm.
findings.GALLBLADDER: A large gallstone seen in the neck measures 1.8 cm. There is no pericholecystic fluid or gallbladder wall thickening.
findings.PANCREAS: Imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation, with portions of the pancreatic tail obscured by overlying bowel gas.
findings.KIDNEYS: The visualized portions of the right kidney are normal.
findings.RETROPERITONEUM: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
